comment.author: 28304000@N00
comment._content:
Actually - the locomotive is a member of the AD60 Class.  It's number is 6002.

Caption should be changed to be "Locomotive AD6002 'Garratt'"
OR
AD60 Class 'Garratt' Locomotive no. 6002.

comment.author: 27331537@N06
comment._content: Hi albert3801, thanks for the extra details we have amended the caption.
